title: AirMan ResQ Emergancy Tyre Repair Kit, with easy valve through punture repair tyre selant, Air Compressor, suitable for all car makes and models

features: TRUSTED: Suitable for all makes and models, for wheel rim sizes upto 20”. AirMan products are made to the highest OEM standards and approved by leading vehicle manufacturers.

SIMPLE: With AirMan onboard, no tools, strength or technical skills are required to fix a puncture at the roadside. The tyre sealant is pumped through the tyre valve by the powerful air compressor for rapid puncture repair. No squeezy bottles or valve core removal needed.
TYRE SAFE: The water based tyre solution is non-toxic, non-corrosive and safe with all TPMS Systems. The sealant does not set hard and is easily washed out to allow for full permanent repair.
CONVENIENT: Seals punctures upto 6mm at the roadside and will last for 125 miles to get you home safe or to a repair garage.

FULLY LOADED: The kit contains a 12V powerful air compressor, a 450ml sealant bottle, and accessories to inflate bike tires and soccer balls. Boxed Measurements - width: 10cm, length: 28cm, height: 15.5cm, weight: 274g.
description: From the manufacturer ResQ Tyre Repair System The versatile and powerful ResQ Repair Kit sets the industry standard for roadside puncture repair, with over 15 million kits used worldwide. This durable and high-quality kit features a powerful 12v air compressor and 450ml bottle of tyre seal for straight forward roadside puncture repair. Suitable for a broad range of tyre sizes all the way up to 20” rims. Rinse & Repair Sealant Active Seal tyre sealant uses Particle Gel Technology to quickly and effectively seal punctures at the roadside. The water based sealant is non toxic, non corrosive, TPMS safe and approved by the largest automotive manufacturers in the world. The patented formulation is pumped directly through the tyre valve and stays liquid inside the tyre to allow for a full repair to be made. Same solution supplied to vehicle manufacturers High performance 12v compressor with cigarette lighter fitting 450ml tyre sealant suitable for wheel sizes upto 21" Water based sealant easily washes out of tyre to allow for full tyre repair Non toxic, non corrosive, TPMS safe and OEM Quality 1. Connect compressor hose to bottle Stop the vehicle in a safe place and turn off engine. Connect the compressor hose to the valve on the bottle. 2. Connect bottle hose to tyre valve Connect the hose from the bottle to the tyre valve and tighten securely. Do not remove any object from the tyre e.g. nails 3. Inflate and go! Turn on the compressor and see the fluid pumped into the tyre whilst inflating. Disconnect and go!
